casebody.data:
Henry B. JOHNSON, Appellant, v. William H. HIATT, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Lewisburg, Pa. No. 9456. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Submitted Oct. 14, 1947. Decided Oct. 17, 1947. Appellant pro se. Arthur A. Maguire, U. S. Atty., of Scranton, Pa., and Thomas Wood, Jr., Asst. U. S. Atty., of Williamsport, Pa., for appellee.

Before ALBERT LEE STEPHENS, GOODRICH, and O’CONNELL, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from, 71 F.Supp. 865, is affirmed.
